name: testlab-ai
description: TestLab-AI - Unified monorepo with React frontend and Python backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: echo 'Start services in separate terminals:' && echo '  Terminal 1: npm run dev:mcp' && echo '  Terminal 2: npm run dev:backend' && echo '  Terminal 3: npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Python backend requires no build step'
